title: DAILY DIVIDEND | Mon, 19 Jan
html:
Anthropic Doubles Valuation, Canada & China Reset, Tesla Probe.. and more

S&P 500: -0.06% | Gold: -0.43% | Bitcoin: +0.17% | VIX: +0.13%

ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡¦ Canada reduces Chinese Tariffs
Canada slashed Chinese EV tariffs from 100% to just 6.1% in a major trade "reset." In exchange, Beijing is expected to lower barriers on Canadian canola.

âš ï¸ Small-Cap Streak ğŸ“ˆ
The Russell 2000 has outpaced the S&P 500 for 10 straight days, gaining 8% YTD. Investors are moving cash into smaller, local companies as "Big Tech" stars start the year in the red.

ğŸ” STOCK SPOTLIGHT

Anthropic (AI/Claude) Private
The startup is reportedly raising $25B at a $350B valuation, nearly double its September valuation, fuelled by a 10x growth in revenue.

Tesla (EV Manufacturer) -0.24%
Regulators have given Tesla until Feb 23 to explain why its "Full Self-Driving" cars are reportedly blowing through red lights and driving into oncoming traffic.

ğŸ“˜ Term of the Day: Fat Finger Trade
When a trader makes a typo (like adding too many zeros) and accidentally triggers a massive, unintended market move.

Disclaimer: Educational purposes only. Not investment advice.
